item.title: Step 1. Create a new XContext participantsCtx.bucx
item.description: Create a new XContext named "participantsCtx.bucx" using the New File wizard.

item.title: Step 2. Set the content of participantsCtx.bucx
item.description:
Set the content of "participantsCtx.bucx" as follows.
context participantsCtx
extends membersCtx
constants PRTCPT
axioms
@axm1_2: "PRTCPT ∈ ℙ(MEM)"
@thm1_1: "finite(PRTCPT)" theorem
end

item.title: Step 3. Auto-format the code
item.description: Automatically format the content of "participantsCtx.bucx" by using short-cut (e.g., on Mac OS: Cmd+Shift+F).
